knimeNode.name: Fingerprint Similarity
knimeNode.shortDescription: Calculates the Tanimoto similarity coefficient for two fingerprints of equal size.

fullDescription.intro: Creates a new column containing the minimum, maximum or average Tanimoto similarity coefficient for the fingerprints in the first input table against the second input table. The computations are based on the CDK toolkit. For the minimum and maximum option an additional column is appended to the table containing the row id reference. If the similarity ties, the result will either be returned as pipe-delimited string (string return) or as collection cell (collection return).
fullDescription.option: Select the column containing the molecular fingerprint
Select the aggregation method for the calculation
Select the return type: String Cell or Collection Cell

ports.outPort: As input table plus Tanimoto coefficient column
